mapper.select: SELECT MAL.* FROM ( ( select ROWNUM no,m3p.* from ( select cuNo,cuName,cuPhone,cuSex,'3' mn from customer order by cuNo desc ) m3p ) union ( select ROWNUM no,m2p.* from ( select cuNo,cuName,cuPhone,cuSex,'2' mn from customer order by cuNo desc ) m2p ) UNION ( select ROWNUM no,m1p.* from ( select cuNo,cuName,cuPhone,cuSex,'1' mn from customer order by cuNo desc ) m1p ) ) MAL where mal.mn=#{mn}
